recipesJson.name: Jarvis - EP#93 - Sugar and Spice Makes All The Nutz Nice
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: Deep Fried mixed nuts coated in cinnamon sugar and topped with a squeeze of lime to perk them up.  The scorched caramel brings out the cooked over an open fire note from the sugar layer.
